subject: RE: [junit] One test class per class (was Testing multiple interfaces?)
msgSnippet: ... Yes - thats why my database tests are called HQLTest (HQL = Hibernate). :) Robert.
messageBody:
> > One test per class makes it easy to find tests that may
> > be affected by a feature change. This makes it easy to
> > run localised tests.
>
> That's another reason why test groups are so important.
> This way, you can say "run all the database tests" and you
> don't care in what classes or packages they are.

Yes - thats why my database tests are called <Foo>HQLTest
(HQL => Hibernate). :)

Robert.
